channel.title: Home on Shrub Co-op
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Shrub Co-op

item.title: Swap Shop
item.description: Swap, donate or buy affordable and high quality preloved clothing, books, shoes, bags, bric-a-brac and household items. Anyone is welcome to buy or donate items. Become a member and you can swap your items in exchange for tokens to use in-store. How It Works! Our vision is for a world without waste. Choosing second hand helps to save carbon emissions and supports a sustainable lifestyle. Unlike your ordinary charity shop, when you donate your preloved items we give you back 25% of their value as tokens.

item.title: SHRUB Relaunch Party!
item.description: SHRUB has evolved - right now is a really exciting time in our history, we’ve just expanded to our new location on Bread Street, opened a new upcycling workshop, and reinvented the Wee Spoke Hub. We’ve organised an evening of speakers and live entertainment, as well as interactive stalls showcasing our different projects. There will be… Upcycling activities, DIY bike maintenance advice from the The Wee Spoke Hub, Nibbles provided by Food Sharing Edinburgh, and refreshments available from the brand new SHRUB Caf√©!
